name: Train Defender (Pikevchu)
description:
You are commissioned by the Mars Mining Corporation to safely deliver a payload of rare materials, freshly extracted from the depth of Mars.

Unfortunately, an eco-activist group, Glacier, think that scavenging Mars soil is kinda lame... and will try to stop you from delivering the precious minerals.

You have to fight back !

=== CONTROLS ===

The train have two modes : Shield and Fire.

Press "S" to activate the shield and prevent any damage. Once shielded, enemy hits will enforce your next projectiles.

Press "F" to switch to fire mode, aim and shoot with mouse left click.

Press "P" to pause the game.

=== CREDITS ===

2D, 3D assets and audio SFX from Kenney : https://kenney.nl/assets

Musics from Technoaxe : http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

Game design and development by Pikevchu.
